summary: PowerBI bot that runs on data
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Bot avatar icon with data analytics theme, geometric design (bot-avatar.dim_128x128.png)
- Dashboard header background with subtle data visualization pattern (dashboard-header.dim_1200x300.png)

existing_features.title: Build a dashboard interface to display PowerBI-style data visualizations including charts, graphs, and key metrics
Create a chat interface where users can interact with the bot to query data and receive data-driven responses
Implement data upload and import functionality allowing users to connect data sources that the bot will analyze

Design a professional, data-analytics focused visual theme with a clean layout emphasizing data clarity, using a corporate color palette (charcoal, emerald green, white) with clear typography and structured information hierarchy suitable for business intelligence applications

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a PowerBI bot that runs on data
Create a backend data model to store and manage bot configuration including data sources, query parameters, and bot responses
Implement backend functions to process data queries and generate bot responses based on stored data patterns
